summary: Former getaway driver Charles Bronson jeopardizes his Witness Protection Plan identity in order to help his girlfriend get to Los Angeles. The feds and Charles' former gang chase them on the road.
cast: Kristen Bell|Dax Shepard|Tom Arnold|Kristin Chenoweth|Michael Rosenbaum|Jess Rowland|Carly Hatter|Steve Agee|Bradley Cooper|Joy Bryant|Kal Bennett|John Duff|David Koechner|Ryan Hansen|Beau Bridges|Jason Bateman|Nate Tuck|Sean Hayes|Kyla Snodgrass|Shea Snodgrass|Jamie Snodgrass|Laura Labo|Graham Mackie|Todd Conant|Valentina Arizo|Virginia Briscoe|Gloria Sue Holmes|Bob Noss|Cameron Cruz|Shannon Joy Rodgers
keywords: witness protection|getaway driver|driving a car|driving|pontiac solstice
title: Fuga explosiva
